product.title: Eston Carry Case For Hair Straightener Protective Travel Bag with Handle & Internal Secure Band for Limited edition Ceramic
product.title_excluding_brand: Carry Case For Hair Straightener Protective Travel Bag with Handle & Internal Secure Band for Limited edition Ceramic
product.description:
Features:
Protect your Limited edition Ceramic Straightener in stylish with our storage case, designings for durability and resiliences against and impacts.
Featuring a secure strap to hold your straightener firmly in place, this carrying bag prevents collisions damage while maintaining for easy transport.
Suitable for stylish individuals who demand both function and fashion from their accessories, ensuring their hair styling tool.
Whether you're traveling, attending outdoor event, or simply need storage at household, this hand carry organize.
Enjoy the convenience of a handle case designings that makes it effortless to grab your hair styling essential and go, let your routine smooth and uninterrupted.

Specifications:
Size: 9x11x45cm/3.54x4.33x17.72inch

note:
Please allow 1 to 3cm error due to manual measurement, please make sure you do not mind before your bid,
Due to the differences between different monitors, the picture may not reflect the actual colorful of the item.

Package Includes:
1xStraightener Case
